dashboard.description: Visualization of the Component and Integration Promotion Pipelines

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo for master.

targets.query: SELECT count("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'master' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "name" fill(0)

panels.title: Promotions for CentOS-8 master tripleo ci ( current-tripleo )

targets.query: select   "component",  "repo_url", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'baremetal' )
select   "component",  "repo_url", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'cinder' )
select   "component",  "repo_url", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'clients' )
select   "component",  "repo_url", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'cloudops' )
select   "component",  "repo_url", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'common' )
select   "component",  "repo_url", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'compute' )
select   "component",  "repo_url", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'glance' )
select   "component",  "repo_url", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'manila' )
select   "component",  "repo_url", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'network' )
select   "component",  "repo_url", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'octavia' )
select   "component",  "repo_url", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'security' )
select   "component",  "repo_url", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'swift' )
select   "component",  "repo_url", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'tempest' )
select   "component",  "repo_url", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'tripleo' )

panels.title: Master Components: Days since last promotion

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo-rdo for master. Default time is the last 2 weeks.

targets.query: SELECT count("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'master' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "name" fill(0)

panels.title: Promotions for CentOS-8 master RDO ( current-tripleo-rdo )

panels.description: List of the latest failing integration / promotion  jobs.

targets.query: SELECT "log_link", "duration", "result" FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "pipeline" =~ /periodic/ AND "type" = 'rdo' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "job_name" =~ /master/) AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Master failing periodic jobs

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo for ussuri.

targets.query: SELECT count("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'ussuri' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "name" fill(0)

panels.title: Ussuri Components: Days since last promotion

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo-rdo for ussuri. Default time is the last 2 weeks.

targets.query: SELECT count("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'ussuri' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "name" fill(0)

panels.title: Promotions for CentOS-8 ussuri RDO ( current-tripleo-rdo )

panels.description: List of the latest failing integration / promotion  jobs.

targets.query: SELECT "log_link", "duration", "result" FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "pipeline" =~ /periodic/ AND "type" = 'rdo' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "job_name" =~ /ussuri/) AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Ussuri failing periodic jobs

dashboard.title: Upstream and RDO promotions
